name: get Ph record
get Temp record

PH Chart
Temp Chart
Turb Chart
stop spin
Photo Name
func:
msg.filename = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000).toString();
return msg;

var m_first = []
var m_second = []
var m_third = []
var m_labels = []
var a
var startTime = 1577836800000
for(x=1;x<=25;x++){
    a = {x: new Date(startTime), y: Math.random() * 300}
    m_first.push(a)
    startTime += 86400000
}
startTime = 1577836800000
for(x=1;x<=25;x++){
    a = -2.5 + Math.random() * 5
    m_second.push(a)
    m_third.push(a*10)
    startTime += 86400000
    m_labels.push("label_"+x)
}

msg.payload = {}
msg.payload.first = JSON.stringify(m_first)
msg.payload.second = JSON.stringify(m_second)
msg.payload.third = JSON.stringify(m_third)
msg.payload.labels = JSON.stringify(m_labels)
return msg;

template:
<canvas id="myChart" width=600 height =300></canvas>
<script>
var textcolor = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--nr-dashboard-widgetTextColor');
var gridcolor = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--nr-dashboard-groupBorderColor');
var linecolors = ['#009900','#889900','#449900']

var ctx = document.getElementById('myChart').getContext('2d');
var chart = new Chart(ctx, {
    // The type of chart we want to create
    type: 'bar',

    // The data for our dataset
    data: {
        labels: {{{payload.labels}}},
        datasets: [
            {
                type:'line',
                label: 'First',
                backgroundColor: linecolors[0],
                borderColor: linecolors[0],
                data: {{{payload.first}}},
                yAxisID: 'left-y-axis',
                steppedLine: false,
                fill: false,
                borderWidth: 1
            },
            {
                type:'line',
                label: 'Second',
                
                backgroundColor: linecolors[1],
                borderColor: linecolors[1],
                data: {{{payload.second}}},
                yAxisID: 'right-y-axis',
                steppedLine: false,
                fill: false,
                borderWidth: 1
            },
            {
                type:'line',
                label: 'Third',
                
                backgroundColor: linecolors[2],
                borderColor: linecolors[2],
                data: {{{payload.third}}},
                yAxisID: 'left-y-axis',
                steppedLine: false,
                fill: false,
                borderWidth: 1
            }
        ]
    },

    // Configuration options go here
    options: {
        scales: {
            yAxes: [
                {
                    gridLines :{display:false},
                    id: 'left-y-axis',
                    type: 'linear',
                    position: 'left',
                    ticks: {
                        fontColor: linecolors[0]
                    }
                },
                {
                    gridLines :{zeroLineColor:gridcolor,color:gridcolor,lineWidth:0.5},
                    id: 'right-y-axis',
                    type: 'linear',
                    position: 'right',
                    ticks: {
                        fontColor:linecolors[1]
                    }
                },
                {
                    gridLines :{zeroLineColor:gridcolor,color:gridcolor,lineWidth:0.5},
                    id: 'left-y-axis',
                    type: 'linear',
                    position: 'left',
                    ticks: {
                        fontColor:linecolors[1]
                    }
                }
            ],
            xAxes: [
                {
                    gridLines :{zeroLineColor:gridcolor,color:gridcolor,lineWidth:0.5},
                    
                    ticks: {
                        fontColor:textcolor
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    }
});
</script>

name: Inject Alcohol
Autoclave Process
info:
Autoclave Process
1. Input Alcohol
2. Spining
3. Output Alcohol
4. Heat pad

name: Spin Alcohol
Flush Alcohol
Get Sping Time
func:
msg.payload["time"] = 60 * (global.get("timeAlcIn") + global.get("timeAlcStay"));
return msg;

name: Get Flush Time
Get Heating Time
func:
msg["delay"] = 60000 * (global.get("timeAlcIn") + global.get("timeAlcStay") + global.get("timeAlcIn") + global.get("heatingTime"));
return msg;

name: Get Ingection Time
func:
msg.payload["time"] = 60 * global.get("timeAlcIn");
return msg;
